meanings.definition: A male peafowl, which has a crest and brightly colored plumage.
meanings.sent1: The peacocks strutted proudly, showing off their vibrant feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of peacocks roaming freely in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The peacocks decided to have a fashion show to display their fancy feathers.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as colorful as a group of peacocks in full display.
meanings.sent5: The peacocks' feathers shimmered in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The male of the peafowl, known for its extravagant plumage.
meanings.sent1: Visitors to the park were amazed by the beauty of the peacocks.
meanings.sent2: The peacocks' feathers were a dazzling array of colors.
meanings.sent3: The peacocks held a contest to see who had the most stylish feathers.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as eye-catching as a peacock's plumage.
meanings.sent5: The peacocks' tails fanned out gracefully, mesmerizing all who watched.

meanings.definition: A large and brightly colored bird with a long tail that can be spread out like a fan.
meanings.sent1: The peacocks in the garden added a touch of elegance to the scenery.
meanings.sent2: We were greeted by a flock of peacocks as we entered the park.
meanings.sent3: The peacocks decided to put on a dance performance with their tails as fans.
meanings.sent4: The peacocks' tails spread out like a beautiful painting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The peacocks' vibrant colors made them stand out among the other birds.
